summary: Defines a configurable blueprint for exporting machine learning models to the ONNX format, encapsulating metadata such as default batch size, sequence length, opset version, and input/output specifications, while providing utilities to generate placeholder data, validate tolerances, and manage operation patches and external data handling.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable and standardized conversion of models into ONNX, supporting validation, runtime compatibility, and seamless integration into downstream deployment pipelines.
